casebody.data:
In the Matter of Louis MILLER, Trading as Midtown Lumber Company, Bankrupt; Joseph T. Stearns, Trustee-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 5, 1928. No. 203. *1019Charles Soble, of New York City, for the bankrupt. Archibald Palmer, of New York City (Max L. Eosenstein, of New York City, of counsel), for trustee-appellant.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PEE CUEIAM.

Order affirmed.
